channel.title: m68k on The 8-bit Zine
channel.description: Recent content in m68k on The 8-bit Zine

item.title: Tracker music without a tracker
item.description: As a musician, I have always envied demoscene artists the possibility of working with modern software. The graphic artist will prepare the image in Photoshop, than all he needs to do is to use the converter and copy the file to his retro-computer. That’s all - art for demoarty is ready. A musician’s life is not that easy. Musician has to work with trackers, whether he wants it or not.
